title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When using Build F2 (20020602)Redhat 7.2, GTK2KDE 2.210(GTK2 only) and opening the ImageAnalyzer example, it can be observed that the scrollbars are enabled. However, when attempting to move them, they do not have any effect. This behavior can be especially misleading when working with small images such as icons, as the scrollbars give the impression of being functional although they do not serve any purpose.
